entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
